Class representing an update sent by the client. More...

 ~Update ()
 The Update is responsible for deallocation of the DataObject if and only if it is of type 'eModify'.

Private Attributes

 The id of the initiator of the update.

const Reference * mReference
 Reference to the object to be updated.

const Reference * mTarget
 Reference to the object that should be notified of the update.

DataObject * mObject
 The DataObject containing the update information except for remove updates that does not need such information.

int mType
 The type of Update according to the eType enumeration.

Finds the closest parent to the DataObject pointed out by the provided Reference that is a ComplexDataObject.

Parameters:

Returns:
A Reference to the closest complex parent or null if no such parent was found.
